languages.text: {n}Лицо молодого человека становится очень серьезным.{/n} "Именно так. Это, если позволите, личное дело. И не только потому, что происходит в системе, принадлежащей моему отцу. Комендант тюрьмы, Ан... был моим близким другом когда-то. Я хочу дать ему шанс образумиться, сложить оружие и прекратить этот бессмысленный мятеж".

{n}Evayne's expression is grave.{/n} "Indeed. It is a personal matter, if you will. And not simply because this incident occurred in a system that belongs to my father. The prison warden, An... he used to be a close friend of mine, once. I want to give him a chance to come to his senses, lay down his weapons, and stop this senseless uprising."
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо молодого человека становится очень серьезным.{/n} "Именно так. Это, если позволите, личное дело. И не только потому, что происходит в системе, принадлежащей моему отцу. Комендант тюрьмы, Ан... был моим близким другом когда-то. Я хочу дать ему шанс образумиться, сложить оружие и прекратить этот бессмысленный мятеж".

The prison warden, An... he used to be a close friend of mine, once. I want to give him a chance to come to his senses, lay down his weapons, and stop this senseless uprising."

The prison warden, An... he used to be a close friend of mine, once. I want to give him a chance to come to his senses, lay down his weapons, and stop this senseless uprising."

The prison warden, An... he used to be a close friend of mine, once. I want to give him a chance to come to his senses, lay down his weapons, and stop this senseless uprising."

{n}Evayne's expression is grave.{/n} "Indeed. It is a personal matter, if you will. And not simply because this incident occurred in a system that belongs to my father. The prison warden, An... he used to be a close friend of mine, once. I want to give him a chance to come to his senses, lay down his weapons, and stop this senseless uprising."

{n}Evayne's expression is grave.{/n} "Indeed. It is a personal matter, if you will. And not simply because this incident occurred in a system that belongs to my father. The prison warden, An... he used to be a close friend of mine, once. I want to give him a chance to come to his senses, lay down his weapons, and stop this senseless uprising."

languages.text: {n}Evayne hace un gesto solemne.{/n} «En efecto. Es un asunto personal, por así decirlo. Y no solo porque este incidente ocurriera en un sistema que pertenece a mi padre. El alcaide de la prisión, An... fue otrora un íntimo amigo mío. Quiero otorgarle la oportunidad de recapacitar, deponer sus armas y detener esta insensata sublevación».
languages.original_text: {n}Evayne's expression is grave.{/n} "Indeed. It is a personal matter, if you will. And not simply because this incident occurred in a system that belongs to my father. The prison warden, An... he used to be a close friend of mine, once. I want to give him a chance to come to his senses, lay down his weapons, and stop this senseless uprising."

traits.locale_text: {n}Evayne hace un gesto solemne.{/n} «En efecto. Es un asunto personal, por así decirlo. Y no solo porque este incidente ocurriera en un sistema que pertenece a mi padre. El alcaide de la prisión, An... fue otrora un íntimo amigo mío. Quiero otorgarle la oportunidad de recapacitar, deponer sus armas y detener esta insensata sublevación».

languages.text: {n}Evaynes Miene ist ernst.{/n} "In der Tat. Es ist eine persönliche Angelegenheit, wenn Ihr so möchtet. Und nicht nur, weil sich dieser Zwischenfall in einem System ereignet hat, das meinem Vater gehört. Der Gefängnisdirektor, An ... er war früher ein enger Freund von mir. Ich will ihm die Gelegenheit geben, zur Vernunft zu kommen, die Waffen niederzulegen und diesen sinnlosen Aufstand zu beenden."
languages.original_text: {n}Evayne's expression is grave.{/n} "Indeed. It is a personal matter, if you will. And not simply because this incident occurred in a system that belongs to my father. The prison warden, An... he used to be a close friend of mine, once. I want to give him a chance to come to his senses, lay down his weapons, and stop this senseless uprising."

traits.locale_text: {n}Evaynes Miene ist ernst.{/n} "In der Tat. Es ist eine persönliche Angelegenheit, wenn Ihr so möchtet. Und nicht nur, weil sich dieser Zwischenfall in einem System ereignet hat, das meinem Vater gehört. Der Gefängnisdirektor, An ... er war früher ein enger Freund von mir. Ich will ihm die Gelegenheit geben, zur Vernunft zu kommen, die Waffen niederzulegen und diesen sinnlosen Aufstand zu beenden."

languages.text: {n}Le regard d'Evayne s'assombrit.{/n} « En effet. C'est une histoire de famille, dans un sens. Et pas seulement parce que cet incident se déroule dans un système appartenant à mon père. Le directeur de la prison, An... C'était un bon ami à moi, à une époque. Je veux lui laisser une chance de revenir à la raison, déposer les armes et arrêter cette révolte sans queue ni tête. »
languages.original_text: {n}Evayne's expression is grave.{/n} "Indeed. It is a personal matter, if you will. And not simply because this incident occurred in a system that belongs to my father. The prison warden, An... he used to be a close friend of mine, once. I want to give him a chance to come to his senses, lay down his weapons, and stop this senseless uprising."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard d'Evayne s'assombrit.{/n} « En effet. C'est une histoire de famille, dans un sens. Et pas seulement parce que cet incident se déroule dans un système appartenant à mon père. Le directeur de la prison, An... C'était un bon ami à moi, à une époque. Je veux lui laisser une chance de revenir à la raison, déposer les armes et arrêter cette révolte sans queue ni tête. »

languages.text: {n}艾维尼神情严肃。{/n}“没错，要说的话，这算是我的私事。这不仅仅因为这件事发生在我父亲所管辖的星系里，更是因为，典狱长，安……他曾是我的好友。我希望能给他一个幡然悔悟的机会，缴械投降，停止这场毫无意义的暴动。”
languages.original_text: {n}Evayne's expression is grave.{/n} "Indeed. It is a personal matter, if you will. And not simply because this incident occurred in a system that belongs to my father. The prison warden, An... he used to be a close friend of mine, once. I want to give him a chance to come to his senses, lay down his weapons, and stop this senseless uprising."

traits.locale_text: {n}艾维尼神情严肃。{/n}“没错，要说的话，这算是我的私事。这不仅仅因为这件事发生在我父亲所管辖的星系里，更是因为，典狱长，安……他曾是我的好友。我希望能给他一个幡然悔悟的机会，缴械投降，停止这场毫无意义的暴动。”

languages.text: {n}エヴァインの表情は険しい。{/n}「そうだ。言ってみれば、これは個人的な問題なのだ。理由は、この件が、我が父の所有する星系で起こったことだけじゃない。所長のアン…彼は、かつての俺の親友でね。俺は彼を正気に戻し、武器を捨てて、この無意味な反乱を止める機会を与えたいと思っている」
languages.original_text: {n}Evayne's expression is grave.{/n} "Indeed. It is a personal matter, if you will. And not simply because this incident occurred in a system that belongs to my father. The prison warden, An... he used to be a close friend of mine, once. I want to give him a chance to come to his senses, lay down his weapons, and stop this senseless uprising."

traits.locale_text: {n}エヴァインの表情は険しい。{/n}「確かに。言うなれば、これは個人的な問題だ。この件が、父の所有する星系で起こったという理由だけじゃない。刑務所長のアン…彼は、かつて仲の良い友人だった。正気を取り戻して武器を捨て、この無意味な反乱をやめるチャンスをあげたいんだ」
{n}エヴァインの表情は険しい。{/n}「そうだ。言ってみれば、これは個人的な問題なのだ。理由は、この件が、我が父の所有する星系で起こったことだけじゃない。所長のアン…彼は、かつての俺の親友でね。俺は彼を正気に戻し、武器を捨てて、この無意味な反乱を止める機会を与えたいと思っている」

languages.text: {n}Evayne'in yüzü kasvete bürünüyor.{/n} "Öyle. Ayrıca belirtmek isterim ki bu kişisel bir mesele. Bu olay sırf babama ait bir sistemde meydana geldiği için de değil, hapishane müdürü An... Bir zamanlar yakın arkadaşımdı. Ona aklını başına toplaması, silahlarını bırakması ve bu anlamsız ayaklanmayı durdurması için bir şans vermek istiyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Evayne's expression is grave.{/n} "Indeed. It is a personal matter, if you will. And not simply because this incident occurred in a system that belongs to my father. The prison warden, An... he used to be a close friend of mine, once. I want to give him a chance to come to his senses, lay down his weapons, and stop this senseless uprising."

traits.locale_text: {n}Evayne'in yüzü kasvete bürünüyor.{/n} "Öyle. Ayrıca belirtmek isterim ki bu kişisel bir mesele. Bu olay sırf babama ait bir sistemde meydana geldiği için de değil, hapishane müdürü An... Bir zamanlar yakın arkadaşımdı. Ona aklını başına toplaması, silahlarını bırakması ve bu anlamsız ayaklanmayı durdurması için bir şans vermek istiyorum."
